Job Title: Accounts Payable Specialist

Location: Wichita, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Good Times Restaurants, Inc. owns, operates, franchises, and/or licenses Good Times Burgers and Frozen Custard and Bad Daddy’s Burger Bar. Good Times Burgers currently has 31 operating locations homegrown in Colorado. Bad Daddy’s currently has 40 locations throughout Colorado, Oklahoma, and all over the Southeast.
Our company is made up of a group of folks who balance getting their work done with some good laughs and comradery in between and we are looking to grow our support center to add an Accounts Payable Specialist to the team!
So what does the Accounts Payable Specialist role look like?The Accounts Payable Specialist will be responsible for monitoring the outflow of capital for the company. 
Duties/Responsibilities:Facilitates payment of vendors, which may include verification of federal ID numbers and resolving discrepancies.Set up new vendors.Process Accounts Payable InvoicesPrepare weekly and ad hoc pay runs.Assists with accounting records and ledgers by reconciling monthly statements and transactions.Calculates and reports sales tax based on paid invoices.Maintain invoice workflow approvals.Works closely with vendors and with store managers.Other related duties as assigned.
Required Skills/Abilities:Must be reliable and extremely trustworthy. Must be proficient in Microsoft Office Suite or related programs.Must be able to learn other accounting software systems. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. Ability to maintain confidential and meticulous records.
Education and Experience:High school diploma required; Business or Accounting degree preferred.Certified Accounts Payable Professional (CAPP) certification preferred.Three to five years of related experience is preferred.Physical Requirements:Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer.
What's in it for you? Awesome question! Here are some of the benefits you will have as an Accounts Payable Specialist.Target incentive bonus.Currently a remote position with the potential for hybrid 2-3 days a week at a satellite office in Wichita, KS within the next year.Paid vacation, sick days, parental, and bereavement leave.Paid time off for eight holidays throughout the year.Comprehensive health benefits including dental and vision.Company matching 401k.Casual work atmosphere.
If you are looking to kickstart your career in accounting and possess the required skills, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
Good Times Restaurants Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): None
